# Release Notes Template

Use this template when creating a new GitHub release.

## Version: [X.Y.Z] - [YYYY-MM-DD]

### Summary
Brief one-sentence summary of this release.

### Added
- New features and additions

### Changed
- Changes to existing functionality

### Deprecated
- Features that will be removed in future releases

### Removed
- Features removed in this release

### Fixed
- Bug fixes

### Security
- Security improvements and fixes

### Documentation
- Documentation updates

### Migration Guide
(If applicable) Steps users need to take to upgrade:

1. Step one
2. Step two
3. Step three

### Full Changelog
See [CHANGELOG.md](../../CHANGELOG.md) for complete details.

### Contributors
Thank you to all contributors who made this release possible!

### Download
- **Source code**: [vX.Y.Z.zip](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO_NAME/archive/refs/tags/vX.Y.Z.zip)
- **Source code**: [vX.Y.Z.tar.gz](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO_NAME/archive/refs/tags/vX.Y.Z.tar.gz)

### Installation
```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/YOUR_REPO_NAME.git
cd YOUR_REPO_NAME/backend

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt
playwright install chromium
```
